mapper.select: select B.*from(select rownum rn, A.*from(select*from board order by idgroup desc, step asc)A)B where rn between (1+(#{page}-1)*10) and (1+(#{page}-1)*10)+9
mapper.update: update board set hit=hit+1 where id=#{id}
update board set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select B.*from(select rownum rn, A.*from(select*from comments where id=#{id} order by numgroup asc, indent asc, num asc)A)B where rn between 1 and #{count}

select C.*from(select rownum rn, B.*from(select A.*from(select*from board where ${searchtype} like '%${search}%')A order by idgroup desc, step asc)B)C where rn between (1+(#{page}-1)*10) and (1+(#{page}-1)*10)+9
select count(*) from board where ${searchtype} like '%${search}%'
select id, (count(*))count from comments group by id
mapper.update: update comments set comments=#{comments} where num=#{num}
mapper.select: select A.*from(select id, (count(*))count from comments group by id)A where id=#{id}
